verbs.description: if [ARG0: canada] [ARGM-ADV: really] [V: believes] [ARG1: in equality bill c-16 must pass] our government has a duty to protect the human rights of all people laws that seek to enshrine those rights and protect us from discrimination should be considered without hesitation if enacted into bill c 16 senate of canada ontario human rights commission province of canada sexual health and rights bill c 279
